title: R44427
content: This report provides resources and studies on cybersecurity issues related to federal and military agency activities, directing readers to authoritative sources. It includes information from various government agencies, think tanks, academic institutions, news organizations, and other sources. The annotated descriptions are listed in reverse chronological order, focusing on material published in recent years. Tables 4-9 in the report provide information on the federal workforce, White House, cybersecurity framework, Department of Homeland Security, Department of Defense, and National Institute of Standards and Technology.
